name: Guitar Gallery
description: Guitar Gallery is the ultimate destination for guitar lovers. In this Online Shop you can find the instrument that best suits your needs.
technologies: Angular, .NET Core, Entity Framework, Stripe, Redis, Postgres, Bootstrap

name: Matcher
description: Matcher is a dating app that makes it so simple to find your perfect match. Put some love in your life today!
technologies: Angular, .NET Core, Entity Framework, SignalR, Postgres, Bootstrap

name: Connecting People
description: Connecting People is a social website that brings people together through activities that anyone can create.
technologies: React, .NET Core, Entity Framework, SignalR, Postgres, Bootstrap

name: Real Homes
description: Real Homes is a real estate website for finding properties in Europe. All properties are advertised by estate agents. You can search over properties of all styles and prices.
technologies: Angular, Strapi, Postgres, Material UI, Bootstrap

name: Flicher
description: Flicher is a culture magazine about media, movies, music, theater, etc. There is a fully functional administration area for posts, categories and users. Every editor can create, edit or delete his own posts.
